# Tender Announcement

# QNAP NAS Storage

This announcement is a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of **QNAP NAS Storage** services by Shared Services Canada (SSC). 

## Tender Details

### Reference Number
* SSC-23-00023979:T

### Solicitation Number
* BPM019669/23979

### Date of Publication
* 2023-09-28

### Closing Date for Tenders
* 2023-10-12 at 14:00:00 EST

### Amendment Number
* 1

### Region
* Ontario (excluding National Capital Region)

### Trade Agreements
This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Contact Information

Please note that the contact information is in English.

* Contact Name: Eleanor Cesare
* Contact Email: [eleanor.cesare@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:eleanor.cesare@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
* Contact Phone: 613 219-8366
* Contact Fax: 613 960-6026
* Contact Address: 180 Kent Street. 13th Floor, Ottawa, Ontario, K0A 0C3, Canada

### Attachments

Various attachments are available for download via the following URL:
https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download

# Overview

This Request for Proposal (RFP) seeks proposals for the provision of QNAP NAS Storage services to support the computing needs of Shared Services Canada (SSC). The selected supplier shall provide a reliable and secure storage solution for storing, managing, and maintaining large volumes of data. The storage solution must be scalable to meet the growing needs of SSC.

# Evaluation Criteria

The proposals will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* Technical capabilities of the proposed storage solution
* Cost-effectiveness of the proposed solution
* Capacity to meet the storage needs of SSC
* Timeliness of delivery and installation

# Important Dates

* RFP Publication Date: 2023-09-28
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-10-12 at 14:00:00 EST
* Anticipated Contract Start Date: To be determined
* Anticipated Contract End Date: To be determined

Please refer to the RFP package for detailed information regarding the requirements and specifications for this procurement.
